Welcome to HARP's documentation!
================================

HARP v1.0.1: Harwell Automated Recon Processor

Tool to crop, scale and compress reconstructed images from microCT  or OPT data

Content
-------------------------------

* GUI functions
	* Main GUI
	* Autofill
	* Errocheck
	*  
* Processing
	* autocrop
	*
